comment.p: Both dats were generated using DatUtil (with sorting switched on) and are intended for:

li.p: Users of MESS32 (where listinfo is not available)
CMPro users of MESS (if they haven't compiled in my sample fix)
Anyone who uses RomCenter (you must use this dat for correct behaviour)
